segments.text: Observing this kitchen, it's a typical setup.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Woman at the sink, handling dishes methodically.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, the water's cascading over the rimâ€”wow!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She remains unaware, towel in hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the left, the cabinet's open with the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on the stool, extending to grab some.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's tilting back a bit, unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl beside him, arm raised expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The view out the window is serene, bushes and path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Overall, a slice of everyday life with hidden risks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I didn't expect the mischief from the kids.
segments.speaker: PAR
